WorkItem.Description:
I downloaded WabbitEmu 2.1 on my Mac OSX 10.8.2.

When I start WabbitEmu, I choose File -> Open and choose my ROM (ti82, ti83, etc).

After that, if I click with my mouse on the calculators buttons, the mapping is all weird. On my TI82, when I click on Graph, it input log(...

Many buttons simply do not produce anything. My roms are good because they work fine in Tilem in Linux.

Do you have any idea?
WorkItem.Summary: Problem with mouse and key on Mac

Comments.Message: i had the same issue. are you using the retina display macbook? if so, its the high dpi resolutions/retina resolution mode that i guess wabbitemu does not support. i use an app called quickres to switch to the standard res mode like on a regular macbook and it now works perfectly at 1920x1200 standard resolution.

Maybe this can solve the problem but I think it would be better to fix wabbit to work with Retina display. I don't think that in the long term, always changing the screen resolution to go back to non-retina is the solution.

But thank you for the fix for now!
